page.title: 07 ******FARMING******
page.content: Although the area is considered to be rural only two farms are actually sited within our grid: (a){Repton Road Farm-}32 acres mixed husbandry.Presently farmed by the Woodis family and for the last 50 yrs. They have a dairy herd of 58 Fresians and 3 Jersey cows.In addition they have a few sheep with 17 lambs in May 1985.In common with local practice mied cereal and fodder crops occupy most of the none pasture land. (b) {Rosemary Farm- }This 14 acre farm has been run by the Acres family for the past 38 yrs.It is mainly a chicken farm using a 'battery' deep litter process. The bulk of the land is used for cropping of mixed cereals although the farmer keeps 18 dairy cowsand 4 bulls-beef production.
